sentences.en: After a washout period, patients were over to alternate treatment.
sentences.cn: 药物洗脱期后, 患者换成另一种治疗方案.

sentences.en: From the house they watched the washout of their newly seeded lawn by the water.
sentences.cn: 他们在房子里看到雨水正在冲刷新种的草地.
这场比赛因雨提前结束.

sentences.en: The graduation party was a washout because of the big storm.
sentences.cn: 因为暴风雪的来袭,毕业舞会完全失败.

sentences.en: The party was a total washout.
The picnic was a total washout – nobody turned up!
sentences.cn: 野餐彻底失败——根本没人来！

sentences.en: The rock concert was a washout.
sentences.cn: 那场摇滚音乐会真叫人失望.
